command.name: kgv2 rules
command.reply: **Rules** 1. Please be respectful of others. 2. Please do not spam. 3. No Racism. 4. No NSFW content of any kind. 5. Memes MUST be dank. 6. No being rude to other players, or the staff. 7. If you have any issues with a player/staff member. Please let a higher up know. 8. No rape jokes or memes of any kind. 9. NO TALK OF POLITICS EVER. 10. No talk about religion.

command.name: kgv2 servers
command.reply: **Servers** Garry's Mod Murder - 158.69.123.8:27019 Garry's Mod Prop Hunt - 158.69.123.8:27018

command.name: kgv2 about
command.reply: **About** The KG Bot (V2) is a badass Discord bot developed in Java by <@196425012670889984> and <@472444248747409420>. Everything is configurable in an XML file. There is a continuous development to this bot to add new features along with improving the already-existing features. Feel free to message the KG Staff if you have a suggestion!

command.reply: Christian and Angel are both noobs!

command.name: kgv2 play
command.reply: This feature is currently a work-in-progress. <@196425012670889984> will be developing this feature into the bot. Expected release date is February 27th, 2019. We will provide updates as time goes on!
